website_summaries.verdict: Nostalgic-looking lamp that does the job.
pros: Smaller lamp that gives off a pleasing green glow
The glass is a good thickness
cons: Packaging is flimsy, so breakage on delivery has been reported

customer_reviews.title: Great CHEAP Banker's Lamp
customer_reviews.text: Love everything about this lamp except for the fact that the bulb socket is on one side, making the lampshade unevenly bright/dark.
customer_reviews.author: K. Potter

customer_reviews.title: Good, not great
customer_reviews.text: I like the look of the lamp for the most part but there are a couple of things I'm not totally happy about. First, the glass isn't coated very well. Shows small spots where the light spots through the green. That's a quality issue. Second, the stem is kind of cheap. Just a piece of thin hollow tube that's not very well plated. It screws into the base and I had some problems getting it started, and as careful as I was I'm pretty sure I cross threaded it. Still, it works and isn't terrible but if you're looking for high quality I'd say keep looking.
customer_reviews.author: Kp

customer_reviews.title: Looks great with a low wattage bulb.
customer_reviews.text: This really classes up my office. I'm going for a 1960's theme, and this fits it well. The color is nice, a beautiful green and brass shines brightly. The pull cable feels great and the mounting screw portion doesn't feel as Chinesium as similarly priced items. I'll upload pictures when the office theme is complete! I paired it with a 3000k (amber/yellow) LED and leave the light on through the workday. The spikes in power effecting other lights doesn't effect this lamp with the LED bulb. A regular size bulb will fit this without sticking out the lamp.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: The Quality Shows
customer_reviews.text: We almost canceled this, due to price -- boy, am I glad I didn't! Works really well (saves eye-strain) on my wife's desk (I have a computer work-bench with an older one of these too), and looks really great! Now that's she's tried it all complaints have ceased. SLIGHT assembly required, but you can't go wrong -- just gently but firmly pull the cord through when you need to. Well-packed (without 40-watt bulb). Sits nicely, and of course the glass shade tilts easily.
customer_reviews.author: SteveH

customer_reviews.title: LIKE THE LOOKS
customer_reviews.text: BOUGHT A TABLE TO DO PAPER WORK ON. WANTED A LAMP FOR THE TABLE. LOTS OF HI TECH LAMPS BUT WANTED SOMETHING THAT LOOKS LIKE A LIBRARY LAMP OF OLD. I WILL BE 89 IN AUGUST SO TEND TO BE NOSTALGIC. WHILE GREAT DEPRESSION WAS ROUGH, THIS PANDEMIC WORLD IS MORE DEPRESSING BUT I AM OLD MAN, THEN A CHILD BUT ASSEMBLED LAMP OK, PLUGGED IN. SEEMS FINE. SADLY FIRST ONE WHEN I TOOK LAMP OUT OF BOOX GLASS SHADE BROKE. SOME GLASS IF VERY FRAGILE. GOT SECOND ONE IN DAYS.
customer_reviews.author: padre viejo

customer_reviews.title: Good for what you pay
customer_reviews.text: Keep in mind it is one of the less expensive options and you wont be dissatisfied. It has the look of a more expensive option, but once you pick it up you can tell it is not. It's solid enough, I dont think it will fall apart, but the base is not the sort of heavy dense thing you would get in a more authentic (and expensive) model. The shade is a nice green glass and the pull chain works. I wouldn't buy this for a swanky club or anything but it is great for my kids desk.
customer_reviews.author: RHS

customer_reviews.title: Parts Lining Up Properly
customer_reviews.text: I had one of these on my desk for many years. When it finally stopped working I ordered this one from Amazon. I guess what should I expect from Chinese crap? Here's the one thing with this unit. If you fully tighten the base to the top the electric cord is in the front instead of the back the way it's supposed to be! So I have to keep it loose. I thought of sending it back but I didn't want to be bothered with repacking it. My old one was made correctly. probably because it was so old it was Made in The USA.
customer_reviews.author: Danno C.

customer_reviews.title: Everything I Wanted
customer_reviews.text: I was a little hesitant based on some reviews of this lamp, but so far so good. Not museum quality, but for the price it's a solid lamp. Just don't pull the chain too hard and it probably won't pull out like some complained about. The metal is a little cheesy, but it doesn't tip over and it's solid enough that it isn't going to collapse or anything. The green glass is heavy, solid and thick, however I limit the amount of adjusting I do of it so it doesn't break. Use some common sense and this lamp will do you just fine.
customer_reviews.author: RS

customer_reviews.title: Bad purchase
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this lamp to replace an identical lamp that thanks to my carelessness had sustained a broken shade. The new lamp was really junk. I was able, however, to remove the shade from the new lamp and install on my old lamp, with some difficulty, and the old lamp is working quite well. The new lamp went into the garbage can.
customer_reviews.author: Bluefox20006

customer_reviews.title: Great Desk Lamp
customer_reviews.text: I’ve always had one of these green bankers lamps on my desk when working on designing computer systems or writing code. With the right bulb in it, you get a nice even light across the desk without it shining into your eyes as with other lamps. If I had more than one desk I would be buying more than one lamp, but you can’t go wrong with one of these. See my reviews on the lightbulbs that I purchased with it.
customer_reviews.author: George McGinn

customer_reviews.title: Better than its picture.
customer_reviews.text: Very solid lamp. Looked a bit cheap in the photo but the price was right and I was pleasantly surprised. Put it together myself--very easy, and it looks great. Also, when I pull the chain to turn on the light, it has a hefty base which keeps it from tipping or moving. On my desk and am very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Janet T. Mason

customer_reviews.title: Great durable bulbs.
customer_reviews.text: These worked great in my cousin's curio cabinet. She had me changing standard incandescent light bulbs every other month. I bought these and have not had to change a light bulb in her cabinet yet and that was 6 months ago. On at dusk, off at bedtime, on at dusk, off at bedtime every day. I think these are going to last a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Frank X

customer_reviews.title: Provides light & looks nice, buuut...
customer_reviews.text: Wow! This thing is cheap! It functions fine, and does look pretty nice. But don't expect some quality lamp (as you might could tell by the price). It's decent enough - it provides light at my desk, and looks nice. Just don't ever touch it, and you'll think you have a quality lamp. : )
customer_reviews.author: Justin W Rowland

customer_reviews.title: Intelligent Lamp | Affordable Price
customer_reviews.text: I love this lamp! I chose the green shade option as opposed to the white shade - my grandma had a green bankers lamp and I always liked the look of it. Now I have my own and I will use it for studying and for work, and for admiring when I'm just looking around the room. Keep in mind that you will need to purchase a bulb separately, a 40 watt bulb is what you should use. I personally use an LED bulb.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas James Evans

customer_reviews.title: What I needed!
customer_reviews.text: This lamp is exactly what I was looking to find for my home office. It is very attractive, as shown, and provides good light; the shade pivots up or down. It was perfectly packed, and the small amount of assembly required was well explained and quickly performed. I give it 4 stars instead of 5 only because the base is quite a bit bigger across than I had expected, or than the photo makes it appear, meaning its footprint is rather greater than might be desirable in some locations. For where I have it now it's just the ticket.
customer_reviews.author: N. O'Connor

customer_reviews.title: I’m in love!
customer_reviews.text: This bankers lamp is the perfect addition to my desk at home! Love the vintage look and feel! It doesn’t get hot or over heat if you buy the right bulb. I bought mine from Home Depot (T10 40W and make sure it’s less then 2inch long). It’s perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Victoria

customer_reviews.title: Well made piece and it looks good
customer_reviews.text: Very nice vintage style lamp. It looks great on a refinished antique sideboard. It is well made with solid pieces. The only thing I think would improve it is if they included the required lightbulb. It is a small base bulb and it required a bit of searching about to get one.
customer_reviews.author: Nate Caplan

customer_reviews.title: Not a reliable light bulb.
customer_reviews.text: Crummy lights. I ordered two. One looked like it had already been blown out, the other one had to be jiggled around before it would light. Not worth sending back, but I will never buy this brand again.
customer_reviews.author: Donna

customer_reviews.title: Works Great.
customer_reviews.text: Functions exactly how it is supposed to. The only drawback is if you tend to rotate the shade itself to shift the light coverage the shade will begin to come loose to the point it will pivot to rest vertically instead of horizontally automatically. This is easily fixed by tightening the washer apparatus that holds the shade in place. Again, this only happens if you rotate the shade alot, and this is the only problem I have had
customer_reviews.author: El Jefe

customer_reviews.title: Cool to the touch
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to protect inquisitive toddlers who always want to touch the piano light. The incandescent bulb was very hot and would burn them. After running this one for an hour, it was only slightly warm to the touch.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin J. Franklin

customer_reviews.title: Very Useful.
customer_reviews.text: This new lamp replaces the exact same one as in the order. We've had the old one for years. It fell off the desk and the glass broke into 3 pieces. This replacement was as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Paula Hunter

customer_reviews.title: NICE CHEAPLY MADE VERSION OF YHE BANKERS LAMP
customer_reviews.text: The green shade “might” be glass but the rest of the lamp is definitely not metal at all the brass finish is plastic. Great knock off, it almost looks like the real thing
customer_reviews.author: saba

customer_reviews.title: Nice lamp came in packaged very nice
customer_reviews.text: Nice lamp came in packaged very nice. Be sure to note that you will need a T10 40W light bulb for this lamp.
customer_reviews.author: libgrl7

customer_reviews.title: Just What I Wanted!
customer_reviews.text: This lamp is exactly what I’ve been looking for— a classic green shade bankers lamp. It’s a great lamp at a great price. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Darrell W. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding value
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice light at a very nice price! Easy to assemble, arrived quickly and well packaged. Built sturdily, just needed a bulb.
customer_reviews.author: Marlena G.

customer_reviews.title: Nice desk lamp
customer_reviews.text: Lightweight but sturdy. Adds a nice cozy decor for a desk or bedside. Easy to assemble as well to replace bulb. Good value.
customer_reviews.author: liz barthe

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking energy saver.
customer_reviews.text: I use these to replace incandescent tube bulbs. They look great, run much cooler, last longer and help keep the electric bill down.
customer_reviews.author: Mike S

customer_reviews.title: Great little light bulbs
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described--these bulbs give a pleasant incandescent-like light (not the glaring white of regular LEDs). Can't judge lifespan but so far so good.
customer_reviews.author: Bethesda Dad

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I have had several of these lamps and they are what I need for my work. The chain will stop working after a while because of use. Nevertheless, I would buy a replacement when necessary.
customer_reviews.author: Delta88

customer_reviews.title: 3 strikes
customer_reviews.text: Post that screwed in base was crooked, cord exited base in front of lamp and cord was so short I would had to reorganize desk for it to replace old lamp.....returned.
customer_reviews.author: tom

customer_reviews.title: Husband's Lamp
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my husband's desk. I have a similar one on my desk. He loves it.
customer_reviews.author: bettybue7

customer_reviews.title: Very nice lamp
customer_reviews.text: As a very happily retired banker who had one of these Bankers Lamps on my desk for decades, I wanted one for home use. Good quality construction and the green shade throws just the right cast of light.
customer_reviews.author: RayT

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: Bought this lamp as christmas preset. Puchased the bulb they siggested for it too. Looks fantasitc when light up. No hot spots.
customer_reviews.author: Spencer GT King

customer_reviews.title: desk lamp
customer_reviews.text: the shade has a shadow where the bulb screws in. only half the shade is lit up nicely. I gave it as a gift and the person who received it doesn't care that is shadowed. BUT I DO!!!! I expected it to look like the pic.
customer_reviews.author: RussellBunnie

customer_reviews.title: Quality Bankers Lamp
customer_reviews.text: I have owed several Bankers lamps in the past and this one met all expectations. It is well made and is a lovely addition to any desk. I bought this one for my grandson and he loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Gayle

customer_reviews.title: I have always had a bankers lamp in my computer ...
customer_reviews.text: I have always had a bankers lamp in my computer room to help do homework at night. 2 years ago I finished up a bachelors degree at night but when my light chain stopped working I just had to replace the bankers lamp. I think I prefer the silver base with blue shade to this gold and green one, but it works well.
customer_reviews.author: MuddyPuppy

customer_reviews.title: I feel so sophisticated using this light.
customer_reviews.text: I love banker's lamps. I don't think they'll ever go out of style. Works great, looks great. Call em Frosted Flakes, cause they're GREEAAAAT!!!
customer_reviews.author: Andy K.

customer_reviews.title: 2 pack - one worked great, the second is dead.
customer_reviews.text: This comes in a 2 pack. One worked great, the other unfortunately didn't work at all.
customer_reviews.author: R. Pritchard

customer_reviews.title: Good value...good product
customer_reviews.text: This lamp is just as described. Easy to assemble and just right for my desk. It arrived on time and in excellent condition.
customer_reviews.author: Jim Hardenbrook

customer_reviews.title: Does NOT include a light bulb. How cheap of Amazon.
customer_reviews.text: Great lamp but so disappointed that it didn't include a bulb. Amazon you can do better than that right????
customer_reviews.author: Orly

customer_reviews.title: Simply beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Three surprises: 1) Arrived in a relatively small box 2) Easy to assemble 3) It is light! (I thought it was going to be heavy). It looks very nice on my study/work table. The only thing is that if you are from Malaysia like me you’d have to find a suitable power adapter in order to be able to use the lamp. Tip: Can find such adapter at D.I.Y outlets.
customer_reviews.author: Adi Afzal Ahmad

customer_reviews.title: Excellent desk lamp
customer_reviews.text: Love this lamp. We now have three in out home office and love them.
customer_reviews.author: B. Tobias

customer_reviews.title: Nice ambience when tilted up against a wall.
customer_reviews.text: Easy assembly, sturdy design, should last a good long time..
customer_reviews.author: Kentbud

customer_reviews.title: Not great
customer_reviews.text: It works as a lamp fine I guess, but its not a particularly high quality one. Mine came with a small imperfection right on the front of the glass shade which really stands out. "Brass finish" means its cheap metal, very cheaply painted gold. I have to consider whether to send this back or not as its not great quality and a little nicked from new. I wouldnt personally recommend this one.
customer_reviews.author: Muti007

customer_reviews.title: Looks great on library table.
customer_reviews.text: I already had a lamp like this and wanted to have a pair on my newly refinished library table. The photo looked like the one I already had so I ordered and the lamp arrived as promised. It was well packaged, no damage and assembled quickly without requiring any tools. It is a perfect match and with a 5000K 815 Lumen LED bulb installed, gives a clean even light to the desktop.
customer_reviews.author: Mysocio

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Very nice desk lamp especially for the money you pay. I would recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Real glass beautiful sturo
customer_reviews.text: Really sturdy , easy to put together just twist the base on . Get this one
customer_reviews.author: Patty

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant...Brilliant..
customer_reviews.text: We received this gorgeous elegant lamp and we are so very pleased with the efficient service of Lightaccents and their product. The lamp with its bright elegant green shade is displayed in our office and it has certainly lit up the dark wood desk. We are enjoying our new purchase and would encourage anyone looking at this item to purchase without disappointment.
customer_reviews.author: Gerry

customer_reviews.title: Green Banker's light
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Always wanted one and now that I am working from home, it is perfect!
customer_reviews.author: CSpears

customer_reviews.title: Works and looks very nice. My only complaint is that when you assemble ...
customer_reviews.text: Works and looks very nice. My only complaint is that when you assemble it the cord does not go straight to the rear of the lamp. It is offset as depicted in the photo which can make placement on a desk odd. Also the glass is a little thinner and more fragile than I expected but since it really isn't meant to be manhandled anyway as long as it arrives in good shape it shouldn't be a problem.

customer_reviews.title: over packaged
customer_reviews.text: Its more of an accent light than a desk lamp and for some reason they tape styrofoam to the box which resulted in a large mess when unpacking
customer_reviews.author: Pah-tu

customer_reviews.title: Always wanted one
customer_reviews.text: I always wanted a bankers lamp. This one is great. Love it. 5/5
customer_reviews.author: Stephen

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: This came unassembled, but it was easy to put together. It only takes up to a 40W bulb incandescent. I am using a 100W LED equivalent. It uses only 17W. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: David S

customer_reviews.title: very happy
customer_reviews.text: Pretty good for the price. It lives up to what they say they are selling
customer_reviews.author: TDgal

customer_reviews.title: Nice lamp
customer_reviews.text: I had one just like it but the globe broke. So I went on line to replace it. It cost more for the globe than to buy a whole new lamp. So I bought another one. I wish there would have been some instructions on how to replace the globe.
customer_reviews.author: HP

customer_reviews.title: Housewarming gift
customer_reviews.text: I've always loved this lamp design. My friend just moved into a new house and after finding the perfect desk for his home office, I thought that this lamp would be a nice housewarming gift. He absolutely loves it!
customer_reviews.author: e. v. partido

customer_reviews.title: love them...bankers lamps!
customer_reviews.text: The size is perfect! We have them on a shelf behind our couch . They give off just enough light, and no glare, The kelly green shade works perfectly with my new couch which is ina different shade of green but they blend very well.I would recommend them and tell anybody who needs a little more extra lighting...
customer_reviews.author: Gayle E. Walker

customer_reviews.title: Great addition
customer_reviews.text: Great addition to my den. Looks great at my desk. Was just the item that I was looking for, at a reasonable price
customer_reviews.author: chesshaus

customer_reviews.title: Good condition for the price
customer_reviews.text: It arrived packaged securely to prevent damage during shipment. Received only a few days after ordering. The overall condition of the lamp is good. The brass is shiny without any visible defects, however the right side arm of the lamp shade (looking directly at it) , where it meets the glass shade, is slightly off with a gap approximately 1/2 inch. It doesn't appear that the arms are bent. Not immediately noticible, but can be distracting for those who pay attention to detail. It accents my office and is in the corner of a desk against the wall, so I'm not that picky about it. Just something to consider.
customer_reviews.author: DerekM

customer_reviews.title: Very reasonably priced banker's lamp.
customer_reviews.text: The light was fine and easy to assemble. I used the light to illuminate a chess board and chess pieces.
customer_reviews.author: Phil Baker

customer_reviews.title: Great lamp, just what I wanted.
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent desk lamp. It looks good and the base is heavy enough to prevent the lamp from moving when I pull the on/off chain. I used a 40 watt (equivalent) CFL bulb which gives plenty of light and the green glass shade prevents glare. I've always liked the green shade desk lamps and I'm very happy I bought this one.
customer_reviews.author: Jerry Davis

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: with the bulbs purchased the shade and the bulb gets too hot
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love it - if you don't look too closely
customer_reviews.text: Looks nice - but don't expect a flawless lamp shade. The first one I received had a major "bubble" that was very visible on the front of the shade. Amazon sent a quick advanced replacement and paid return shipment. The replacement had some minor imperfections in the shade as well - but for the price you certainly cannot complain and I would definitely recommend this product if you set your expectations appropriately.
customer_reviews.author: M. E.

customer_reviews.title: Different lamp
customer_reviews.text: The lamp was different and looked nice on our desk.
customer_reviews.author: Shirley Toolsie

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as promised
customer_reviews.text: Our banker's light was exactly as described and arrived within the time perameters, entirely satisfactory.
customer_reviews.author: happy camper

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made/ broke immediately
customer_reviews.text: This product broke after a month and a half of use.
customer_reviews.author: Tropical Bleach

customer_reviews.title: Great lamp...
customer_reviews.text: I needed one for my office, and it came within a couple of days (Love AmazonPrime!!!). The bulb information is confusing...it took a regular halogen bulb, and works fine. I like that the base is solid, comes in 3 pieces connected by the plug, and the glass shade is maneuverable. It casts light in the direction that I need, and looks really great on my desk. Great buy....and great price!
customer_reviews.author: Laine Kalahiki

customer_reviews.title: Nice memories
customer_reviews.text: My dad loved it... Just like he remembered his old one way back in the day. :)
customer_reviews.author: Laura Zayas

customer_reviews.title: GREAT
customer_reviews.text: it was everything I wanted. I ad been to many stores looking for just this type of desk lamp. ....and then I thought of checking Amazon. That was the end of my looking....the price was reasonable & the free shipping as a prime member certainly serves as a motivator.
customer_reviews.author: kay

customer_reviews.title: Great desk lamp
customer_reviews.text: Use at work because I spend all day looking at computer sceens...overhead florescents produce glare and eyes are 'fuzzy' by end of day...turn florescents off and lamp on...much better! Only thing was green glass shade was dirty when unboxed, almost like PigPen (Peanuts cartoon) was handling before boxing, but it cleaned up fine with some windex...
customer_reviews.author: J. Hager

customer_reviews.title: Good lamp.  Good value.
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with the lamp, which was a replacement for the one I have had for many years. The green shade is the color I had expected and there is sufficient light for my desk even with a 60watt bulb. I also like the little ball pull at the end of the chain.
customer_reviews.author: LTB

customer_reviews.title: You can't beat a banker's lamp for beauty and value!
customer_reviews.text: Incredibly reasonably priced, beautiful green shade, flexible up and down swivel of the shade makes this my favorite lamp as I have 5 of these lamps already, in various rooms. My favorite thing to do is shoot the green lamp shade up towards the ceiling if I am not using it for reading, as it gives the room a wonderful ambience!
customer_reviews.author: P. Masuda

customer_reviews.title: would not order this
customer_reviews.text: Sent this item back immediately. The stand post did not even screw onto the base or top, stripped. Other than that, seemed like a nice produce. Glass was sturdy, green color was nice, but it wobbled because the nuts were stripped.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Weber

customer_reviews.title: Product is well and correctly advertised
customer_reviews.text: I wish the lamp through a bit more light. I use it on my study desk in the evening
customer_reviews.author: Value Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Very nice banker's lamp
customer_reviews.text: The lamp is well made and works nicely. The chain is easy to pull to turn the lamp on and off. I installed a long LED light bulb which gives an even green glow.
customer_reviews.author: JCM

customer_reviews.title: Good lamp so far
customer_reviews.text: I lkie the fast service & good item so far - thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Had a lamp just like this don't know if it was the same manufacture ...
customer_reviews.text: Had a lamp just like this don't know if it was the same manufacture or not. This one was not the same quality. When I screwed the post to the base it was off center, so the lamp is actually crooked as you look at it. Poor quality control especially for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Trimarchi

customer_reviews.title: Surprise!!
customer_reviews.text: LOL the joke is on me. I thought I was purchasing a replacement glass shade for my daughters Banker's lamp. My granddaughter knocked it off the table and broke the glass shade. It's a gorgeous lamp! So, I will give her the new lamp and continue to hunt for a replacement shade. I was surprise how quickly it came. I'm very happy with the service.
customer_reviews.author: Janis Kisman

customer_reviews.title: Id say the lamp is very nice and gives a stylish and old fashioned aesthetic to ...
customer_reviews.text: My lamp arrived with a large hairline crack, likely just from shipping. If it hadnt been for that, Id say the lamp is very nice and gives a stylish and old fashioned aesthetic to my office. I waited to long to get a return, but its still holding up for now. I would get another.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I now have two.
customer_reviews.text: I now have two Bankers desk lights. One sits atop my roll top desk and the other by my reading chair. The quality will surprise you given the low price. You can't beat it for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Nice lamp, shame no bulb included.
customer_reviews.text: Sad that I bought this lamp in '07 for 19.99 at Target and now its 36 bucks on Amazon. The 20 dollar one even came with a bulb! What a luxury it seems these days to include one.
customer_reviews.author: Gino F

customer_reviews.title: Super desk lamp.
customer_reviews.text: Super desk lamp. There are at least two for sale on Amazon, this one is a bit cheaper and is lighter weight. That having been said, it works great and serves it's purpose perfectly. Pretty light green glass shade.
customer_reviews.author: Tina G. Newman

customer_reviews.title: It does a nice job, is well made
customer_reviews.text: nothing special. When I saw it one day online, it reminded me of a lamp my father once had on his desk (I'm 82), so I bought it -- and it's been on my desk since I bought it. It does a nice job, is well made, and brings back pleasant memories.
customer_reviews.author: GR

customer_reviews.title: looks good, not great; works well.
customer_reviews.text: Somewhat lighter and therefore less impressive than expected, used as a desk lamp!
customer_reviews.author: Ida L. Aiken

customer_reviews.title: Excellent desk lamp
customer_reviews.text: Product delivered promptly as described. Beautiful desk lamp for the price. Excellent value.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted.
customer_reviews.text: This lamp arrived quickly in perfect condition and it's the quality I expected for the price. It looks great on my desk and provides a nice light that's easy on the eyes. I've been using it 9 hours a day for several weeks and haven't had any issues. I think some of the bad reviews were because people expected a higher quality, but you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: BJReview

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied customer
customer_reviews.text: Product as described. Matches the other light I have in my library. Good packaging & prompt delivery. Satified customer.
customer_reviews.author: L. U.

customer_reviews.title: good quality product
customer_reviews.text: We broke the shade of our banker's lamp and was looking for a replacement. This product worked out just fine. The size and color were perfect and we were able to transfer this shade to our old lamp. We found this replacement rather quickly, so when delivery was quick, we were very pleased. Would purchase other products from this seller.
customer_reviews.author: MaryAnn Norelli

customer_reviews.title: It looks good on my desk . . .
customer_reviews.text: . . . and it will probably outlive the last two lamps my wife bought, one at a yard sale and one at a consignment store, each of which didn't look too swell, nor last too long. And I didn't have to drive anywhere or bargain with anyone!
customer_reviews.author: pjburnTop Contributor: Historical Fiction Books

customer_reviews.title: Since you'll have to get a bulb, be sure its "color" is about 2700k for optimal "warmth."
customer_reviews.text: Great glow and color. A more flat base would be easier to clean and allow items to be placed there.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for over my elderly father's bed. It's a heavy, sturdy base and the chain pull helps him turn it on without struggling to find a little switch. Absolutely worth every penny! When the little lamp I have goes, I'm getting another one of these for myself.
customer_reviews.author: Doodle

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this lamp as a replacement to one I had for over a decade. It works flawlessly and looks elegant. One caveat, it's on the light side of wight so I added sticky pads to the base to keep it from sliding off the table.
customer_reviews.author: Amazoner

customer_reviews.title: It's easy to assemble and looks great in my husband's home ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a handsome, classy and quite functional lamp. It's easy to assemble and looks great in my husband's home office. Excellent packaging and quick delivery. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Ms.Jensen

customer_reviews.title: Great light
customer_reviews.text: Already had one just needed another one for another room. Love the chain for on and off. Easy can adjust light where u need it. Would recommend we use it on the night stands.
customer_reviews.author: Lonnie Leonard

customer_reviews.title: GREAT... Until the cord broke.
customer_reviews.text: It was all going fine till the on/off cord started to get stuck. I figured out how to get it to still work but all it took was one time for my wife to try to turn my lamp off and kaput... Now, my home office is in the dark ages once again. Would have been a 5 star purchase if it weren't for the faulty on/off cord.
customer_reviews.author: Briggs

customer_reviews.title: Great quality lamp at a bargain price
customer_reviews.text: This is a replacement lamp for a touch lamp I kept on my desk. It has a nice green glass shade, brass finish and weighted base that is adequate when pulling the chain. Very sturdy. I first used a 45 watt CFL light bulb but it was too bright, so replaced it with a cigar shaped 25 watt bulb and now is pleasant to work under. Why pay more?
customer_reviews.author: Speedy5150

customer_reviews.title: Great little lamp
customer_reviews.text: I wish the base had a little more weight to it, but all-in-all I can't complain. I read the revues about it needing more weight and I decided I'd rather save money and bought it anyway. Next time, I spend the extra $10 bucks. : ) I wasn't going to comment, but seeing as the company sent me an email asking for a revue...
customer_reviews.author: B Burr

customer_reviews.title: This is such a nice desk lamp
customer_reviews.text: This is such a nice desk lamp. It is similar to the one I had for decades, that finally broke. The green glass shade is a rich-looking color, and the lamp is heavy and well made. I am very pleased with this purchase for my home office.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara J. Harvey

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great gift for my dad's desk he loves it! Light bulbs not included.
customer_reviews.author: absmcgee

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as Pictured
customer_reviews.text: It's exactly as pictured. I bought this to replace one that I broke. The price was better than I could find anywhere and the quality is identical to all of the others I had looked at.
customer_reviews.author: david prats
